description.value:
Requirements You're wearing your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mask Familiar] in its mask form, and it has the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.Skilled] (Religion) familiar ability.

Your mask can hide you from the undead. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] to undead using vision or lifesense, allowing you to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] without other sources of cover or concealment. This effect lasts only as long as you continue to take no actions other than to Hide, Sneak, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Command an Animal] to direct your mask familiar, or other surreptitious actions. The GM determines which actions end the effect, but attacking, casting spells, activating items, and the like always do.
